recipe.recipe_name: Grilled Chicken and Vegetable Quinoa Salad
recipe.ingredients: - chicken breast (boneless, skinless): 2 medium pieces (about 300g) - quinoa: 1 cup - water: 2 cups - zucchini (sliced): 1 medium - yellow bell pepper (sliced): 1 - red onion (sliced): 1 small - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - lemon juice: 2 tablespoons - garlic powder: 1 teaspoon - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt and pepper: to taste - fresh basil (chopped): 1/4 cup - feta cheese (crumbled, optional): 1/2 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Quinoa: Rinse quinoa under cold water. In a saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add quinoa, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 15 minutes until tender and water is absorbed. Remove from heat and let it cool. 2. Season and Grill Chicken: Preheat grill or grill pan. Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Grill over medium heat for about 6-7 minutes on each side or until fully cooked. Let it rest for a few minutes and then slice. 3. Grill Vegetables: Toss sliced zucchini, yellow bell pepper, and red onion with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill until they are charred and tender. 4. Prepare Dressing: Whisk together lemon juice, remaining olive oil, oregano, salt, and pepper. 5. Assemble the Salad: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, grilled chicken, grilled vegetables, cherry tomatoes, and fresh basil. Drizzle dressing over the top and toss to combine. If using, top with crumbled feta cheese. 6. Serve: Serve the salad warm or at room temperature.
